item.title: Audio Mastering Workflow for Linux
item.description: This series of posts will detail the audio mastering workflow I employ on my main Linux workstation: Watercooled Full ATX Tower Intel i9 @ 4.2Ghz 64GB ECC RAM Arch Linux with the linux-rt kernel patches RME HDSPe MADI PCI-X Interface RME Babyface Pro USB Audio Interface Why? The answer is simple: Linux provides the best audio engineering workflow for audio professionals - hands down. Don’t believe me?
